title: Europe braces for winter by moving away from its main energy provider: Russia.
dc:creator: Liz Alderman and Patricia Cohen

media:content.media:credit: Vesa Laitinen for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A family in Siikajoki, Finland, uses their wood-heated sauna several times a week. They avoid using their electric-powered sauna because of the high cost of energy.
